1406640.name: Fantasy Grounds - Aquatic Menace 3!
1406640.description:
Aquatic Menace 3!

This Token Pack contains some uncommon aquatic creatures to be used in your Adventures.
Included Tokens with color/weapon variations.

This product includes:
  • Aboleth_Crimson
  • Aboleth_ochre
  • Aboleth_pale
  • Aboleth_veil_dark
  • Aboleth_veil_green
  • Aboleth_veil_purple
